alert.note: Alert for Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 1:22PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Sabine Parish in northwestern Louisiana and east central Shelby Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 122 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Patroon, or 17 miles east of Center, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Many, Zwolle, Converse, Oak Grove, Huxley, Noble, Fisher, Negreet, Toledo Bend Reservoir North and Belmont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 PM CDT for northwestern Louisiana...and eastern Texas.
